replies.msg: My friend Tommy has bought an apartment in the former. He's done a month's worth of furniture shopping for his new house but it'll need a lot more work before he can move into it. He asked me about selling his original houseğŸ¡I said "your best bet would be to sell it this year" This Sunday the property developer will be giving a talk on the facilities they're planning on building for the clubhouse which is worth his attention. It'll soak up eighty seven percent of their savings. Tommy is a god-fearing churchgoer who says his prayers every night before he goes to bed. He has recurring flashbacks of a car crash he saw in osaka after seeing a car accident on the news so yesterday he asked a pastor in his church to pray for him. His church stresses the importance of daily prayer in the life of a christian.
